name: Alchemist's Life
description:
The life of the alchemist is a game made in 120 hours in the extra category of ludum dare 50.

You are a ill alchemist searching for a cure and trying to live your life meanwhile.

Most of the game is dragging with the mouse. You can exit with esc and you can open inventory with i

Detail Instructions: Here

Credits:

The rest by @Theredwolf66 (Twitter)

I hope you like it! It was my first gamejam
